name: Pirate Plunderer (JamieCarmichael)
description:
Collect bottles to upgrade your pirate in this 2D platforming game.

Controls:

Move: Arrow Keys

Jumps: Space

Climb chains: Up and Down Arrow Keys

Credits:

Jamie Carmichael

Art: Pirate Bomb by Pixel Frog (itch.io)
